name: SCNPhysicsWorld.TestOption
desc: Keys in options dictionaries that affect how SceneKit searches for bodies in a collision, ray, or sweep test.

items.name: static let backfaceCulling: SCNPhysicsWorld.TestOption
items.desc: The key for choosing whether to ignore back-facing polygons in physics shapes when searching for contacts.

items.name: static let collisionBitMask: SCNPhysicsWorld.TestOption
items.desc: The key for selecting which categories of physics bodies that SceneKit should test for contacts.

items.name: static let searchMode: SCNPhysicsWorld.TestOption
items.desc: The key for selecting the number and order of contacts to be tested.

items.name: struct SCNPhysicsWorld.TestSearchMode
items.desc: Options affecting how SceneKit searches for bodies in a collision, ray, or sweep test, used with the searchMode key.
